amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for weatherization assistance grants by $15 million with offsets from other energy conservation activities.
amendment.purpose: An amdnemdnt to increase the Weatherization Assistance Grants by $15,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Sanders.
